title: WEATHER FORECAST FOR 15 JANUARY 2026 Issued at 05.30 a.m. on 15 January 2026 Showery condition over the island is expected to reduce from today (15th) Showers or thundershowers may occur at a few places in Kaluthara, Galle, Matara and Rathnapura districts after 4.00 p.m. Mainly fair weather will prevail elsewhere. Misty conditions can be expected at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central and Northwestern provinces and in Galle and Matara districts during the early hours of the morning.
